summary: Would You Fuck Your Clone: Critical Role Edition:
title: Would You Fuck Your Clone: Critical Role Edition:
body:
Percy: Yes.

Fjord: No.

Grog: I don’t want to fuck my clone because that would be gay sex and I’m not gay.

Scanlan: I’m not gay, but I would actually totally fuck my clone.

Vax: I’m gay, but I still don’t want to fuck my clone, that’s gross and weird.

Caleb: I don’t want to fuck my clone because my self-loathing is THAT strong.

Beau: I’d totally fuck my clone because I want to know if I’m good in bed.

Jester: I’d fuck my clone because who would know better how to fuck ME than ME?

Keyleth: I’d totally do all sort of weird things to my clone I’d be embarrassed to ask someone else to do.

Yasha: To be honest, fucking my clone has always been my fantasy.

Caduceus: It’s basically the same as masturbating, right? So no big deal.

Vex: It’s not the same as masturbating; it’d be like having sex with your twin. Wrong and bad!

Nott: I would not have sex with my clone because what if my clone is evil.

Molly: Not only would I have sex with my clone, I’d probably make a bunch of clones and just get it on with all of them at once because that’s how pro clone-fucking I am.

summary: Hey critters! How are you all? I had this idea that I would get a notebook (that probably looks pretty) that I could write...
body:
Hey critters! How are you all?

I had this idea that I would get a notebook (that probably looks pretty) that I could write messages in from everyone here, and then send it to the cast/crew for the holidays or for later (depending how long it takes to fill up the book).

The messages can be anything, but be roughly tweet length (280 characters or 35 words), and will be sent to me and I would write them up into the book (maybe with calligraphy, maybe nott), so they are all in one place.

This is very much like the Art Book some of you worked on, but is very much less artistically inclined, and is open to anyone.

I’m also saying to do it by sending me the messages just because it will be easier for everyone (and much cheaper), and much less admin due to addresses and inter-communication.

If you’re interested, send me the messages here on DM (caduceus-clay-m9), and I will add them into the book. I can also add your name, twitter/tumblr/etc handle or keep it anonymous.

Messages will be open until the end of 2018.

Please reblog this if you feel like sending me a message, or even if this idea seems ‘cool’ to you. The more messages I get, the better this gift from us all will be. Love you all 


~version posted 24/08/18~

blog.name: acepalindrome
blog.title: you're going to be something extraordinary
blog.description: Hello, this is Palindrome! I'm currently doing my best to pretend that I'm a functional and well adjusted adult, with varying levels of success! Around this neck of the woods you'll find history stuff, nature stuff, whatever fandoms I'm into at the moment, fanfics I write when I can muster up the energy, the occasional mental breakdown and a variety of fun facts I come across or things I find interesting. Feel free to follow or drop me a line, I promise I'm quite tame.
